name: Evonik Industries - SK-INFLUX® Ceramide Complex
description: Evonik Industries is a global specialty chemicals company and leading supplier of skin-identical ceramides for barrier repair formulations. Their SK-INFLUX® range includes concentrated mixes of ceramides, non-animal cholesterol, free fatty acids, and phytosphingosine that perfectly mimic the natural skin lipid barrier. SK-INFLUX® V MB is their vegan formulation with non-animal cholesterol.
notes: Industry leader in skin-identical ceramides. SK-INFLUX® products contain the optimal ratio of ceramides, cholesterol, and fatty acids for barrier repair. Extensive technical support and formulation guidance available. Premium pricing but highest quality and efficacy.
